messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Talk Like a Pirate Day
messages.msgSnippet: Aaargh Maties!  Me peg leg is full o termites! Oh, wait... tomorrow my peg leg will be full of termites.  Today, just the same old knothole and splinters. Deb
messages.messageBody:
Aaargh Maties! Me peg leg is full o' termites!

Oh, wait... tomorrow my peg leg will be full of termites. Today, just
the same old knothole and splinters.

Deb L

messages.subject: Talk Like a Pirate Day
messages.msgSnippet: Kirby cares about this, so I m passing it on.  I haven t looked at the site, so beware!  (It might be wholly innocuous, but Kirby has procured from somewhere a
messages.messageBody:
Kirby cares about this, so I'm passing it on. I haven't looked at the site,
so beware! (It might be wholly innocuous, but Kirby has procured from
somewhere a list of pirate pick-up lines which he intends to use freely at the Anime
convention he's attending this weekend, where he's going as Black Mage,
dressed as a pirate. (Black Mage dressed as a pirate.) He'll de-piratize after a
day or two, he says.


We would like to remind you of this upcoming event.

Talk Like a Pirate Day

Date: Friday, September 19, 2003
Time: 8:00AM MDT (GMT-06:00)

http://www.talklikeapirate.com/
